frameDefinitions: The Locale is a geographical location as defined by shape.
An Agent resolves an outstanding Problem by finding its solution, explanation, answer, etc.
A Signatory signs an Agreement document, thereby taking on a commitment encoded in the Agreement.  '.
A New_member becomes a member of a socially-constructed Group.

A new Employee obtains a Position with an Employer, with which there are certain Tasks associated; in exchange for the performance of these Tasks, the Employee receives Compensation from the Employer.
An Employer hires an Employee, promising the Employee a certain Compensation in exchange for the performance of a job.
frameExamples: As it turns out, putting all of my eggs in one basket completely <t>solved</t> all of my problems.
. During this time, 84 countries (including the United States) <t>signed</t> the Protocol.
Seven new members and the three countries <t>joined</t> the alliance five years ago.
I <t>signed</t> <t>on</t> with YouTube to make them a new GUI.
John was <t>hired</t> to clean up the file system.
listRoleDefinitions: A stable bounded area.  It is typically the designation of the nouns of Locale-derived frames.
The <fen>Agent</fen> finds the solution or explanation to the outstanding mystery or <fen>Problem</fen>.
The <fen>Problem</fen> is the predicament or mystery that is resolved.
The <fen>Cause</fen> is the non-Agentive event or state of affairs that brings about the resolution of the <fen>Problem</fen>.
This role indicates the <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Problem</fen> is resolved.
This role indicates the location at which the <fen>Problem</fen> is resolved.
The signatory of the <fen>Agreement</fen>.
The entity signifying the identity of the <fen>Signatory</fen>, resulting from the act of writing on the <fen>Agreement</fen> document.
The document which encodes the commitment of the <fen>Signatory</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> at which signature is given.
The place where the signing occurs.
The <fen>New_member</fen> becomes a member of a (socially-defined) <fen>Group</fen>.
The <fen>Group</fen> is a socially-constructed entity composed of members.
This role identifies the time when the <fen>New_member</fen> joins the <fen>Group</fen>.
This role identifies the place where the joining occurs.
The person who enters an employment relation with an <fen>Employer</fen>.
The person (or institution) that the <fen>Employee</fen> enters an employment relationship with.
The label given to a particular type of employment.
The action that the <fen>Employee</fen> is obligated to do for the <fen>Employer</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when an <fen>Employee</fen> signs on with an <fen>Employer</fen>.
This role identifies the place where the <fen>Employee</fen> enteres an employment relationship with an <fen>Employer</fen>.
The person whom the <fen>Employer</fen> takes on as an <fen>Employee</fen>, obligating them to perform some <fen>Task</fen> in order to receive <fen>Compensation</fen>.
The person (or institution) that takes on an <fen>Employee</fen>, giving them  <fen>Compensation</fen> in return for the performance of an assigned <fen>Task</fen>.
The action that the <fen>Employee</fen> is taken on by the <fen>Employer</fen> to do.
The label given to a particular type of employment.
The <fen>Field</fen> that the <fen>Employee</fen> is going to work in for their <fen>Employer</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when an <fen>Employer</fen> hires the <fen>Employee</fen>.
This role identifies the place where the <fen>Employer</fen> hires the <fen>Employee</fen>.
listRoleExamples: If <fex>we</fex> have not been able to resolve a problem to your satisfaction, please email us.
Likewise, once the students worked through <fex>the problem</fex> and obtained their results, their next assignment would be to publish these to the web.
First, <fex>the Tripartite Agreement of 1979</fex> actually solved the only significant friction between the two countries.
A group of international scientists solved the fundamental particle hierarchy question <fex>at an underground accelerator</fex>.
<fex>Eisenhower</fex> signed a treaty  with aliens.
The Attorney General seemingly never put his <fex>signature</fex> on the agreement.
I signed <fex>the contract</fex> and now the dealership claims they made a mistake, quoted the price too low and now I have to pay them more money.
Have <fex>you</fex> signed up for the new Medicare Prescription program?
Please join <fex>our club</fex>! CNI
An avid skier myself, I ventured to Aspen and enrolled in Nevin's school <fex>last winter</fex> to see what all the fuss was about.
In spring of 1983, <fex>Tom</fex> signed on at the historic Wawona Hotel in Yosemite National Park, and continues to perform there nightly in the hotel's piano parlor.
He later played for the Scottish Claymores of the NFL Europe League in the spring of 2001, then signed on <fex>with Baltimore</fex> in July of 2001.

team</fex>.
In the end, however, Gaskill opted to remain out West and signed on <fex>to play Oscar Marone on CBS's The Bold and the Beautiful</fex>.
Things have been very busy with the new job since I signed on <fex>in June, 2001</fex>.
I had signed on <fex>right there</fex> with the rest of the freaks.
<fex>I</fex> was just hired yesterday!
Last month, <fex>IBM</fex> hired Mike Zisman to head up its storage software group.
I was hired <fex>just to empty the trash cans</fex>.
Look, I wasn't hired <fex>as your waitress</fex>!
It's not easy to get hired <fex>in academia</fex>.
Guess who just got hired <fex>today</fex>!
